means: 用机器制造，用机器加工

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"机器，装置"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: machine, machinery, mechanism, apparatus, engine, motor
means: machine ： 普通用词，泛指一切机器。
mechanism ： 指运行系统，简单的机械装置。
apparatus ： 指具有特殊用途的装置。
engine ： 既可泛指或大或小、简单或复杂的机械、机器，又可指产生动力的发动机或引擎。
motor ： 通常指小型或轻型马达、发动机。

word_mean: 机，机器：产生、转换或传送能量或力的装置

sentence.Network_en: Planes dropped bombs and raked the beach with machine gun fire.
sentence.Network_cn: 飞机投下炸弹，并用机关枪扫射海滩。

sentence.Network_en: Parents can programme the machine not to turn on at certain times.
sentence.Network_cn: 父母可以设定这台机器的程序，使它在特定时间段无法开启。

sentence.Network_en: The repairs to the Hafner machine were near to completion.
sentence.Network_cn: 对哈夫纳机器的修理即将结束。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (originally denoting a structure of any kind): from French, via Latin from Doric Greek makhana (Greek mēkhanē, from mēkhos 'contrivance')

encyclopedia.content: machine 英音：[mə'ʃi:n]美音：[mə'ʃin]词典解释 名词n. [C] 1.机器；机械 2. 计算机 3. 汽车；自行车；飞机 4. 机构；操纵组织的核心集团 The Allies finally smashed the Nazi war machine. 同盟国最终粉碎了纳粹的战争机器。 5. 机器人似地工作的人；没有感情或意志的人 及物动词vt. 1. 用机器做 It will take far less time to machine the cuffs than to sew them by hand. 用缝纫机缝

entry.def: A machine is a piece of equipment which uses electricity or an engine in order to do a particular kind of work.

example.ex: I put the coin in the machine and pulled the lever...
example.tran: 我把硬币投入机器，拉动控制杆。

example.ex: The machine can be remotely operated and monitored.
example.tran: 这台机器可以远程操作和监控。

entry.tran: 用机器制造;用机器加工
entry.def: If you machine something, you make it or work on it using a machine.

example.ex: The material is machined in a factory...
example.tran: 这种材料在一家工厂里用机器加工成型。

example.ex: All parts are machined from top grade, high tensile aluminium.
example.tran: 所有零件都是用顶级高强度铝加工而成。

entry.def: You can use machine to refer to a large and well-controlled system or organization.

example.ex: He has put the party publicity machine behind another candidate.
example.tran: 他为另一位参选者在幕后组织政党宣传。

entry.tran: （由于工作过于劳累或乏味）机械般工作的人，做工作不动脑筋的人
entry.def: If you say that someone is a machine, you mean that they are so tired or bored that they do their work without thinking.

example.ex: I think I have got to stop or I might turn into a machine...
example.tran: 我想我得停下来了，否则我就会变成一台机器。

example.ex: He has dedicated himself to his work and become just a writing machine.
example.tran: 他忘我地投入工作，就像是一台写作机器。

means.word_mean: 1. any mechanical or electrical device that transmits or modifies energy to perform or assist in the performance of human tasks
2. an intricate organization that accomplishes its goals efficiently;

sentences.sentence: "the boxer was a magnificent fighting machine"

means.word_mean: 4. 4-wheeled motor vehicle; usually propelled by an internal combustion engine;

sentences.sentence: "he needs a car to get to work"

means.word_mean: 5. a group that controls the activities of a political party;

sentences.sentence: "he was endorsed by the Democratic machine"

means.word_mean: 6. a device for overcoming resistance at one point by applying force at some other point
1. turn, shape, mold, or otherwise finish by machinery

sentences.sentence: "The Americans were machining while others still hand-made cars"

Sentence.sentence: It turns out that the guy operates the printing machine with amazing speed, and soon he's turning out newspapers with shocking headlines.
Bedrooms and cars are the most obvious examples, but you can also rent camping spaces in Sweden, fields in Australia and washing machines in France
The video machine has to be checked.

sentences.en: The machine has been idled away for several minutes to get it warm.
sentences.cn: 机器空转了几分钟以预热。

sentences.en: The washing machine seems to have broken down again.
Years of doing the same dull job can turn you into a machine.
sentences.cn: 经年累月地做一种单调的工作, 能把活人也做成机器。

sentences.en: He thundered down the street on his new machine.
sentences.cn: 他驾驶着新车在大街上呼啸而去。

means.word_mean: 用机器制造, 用机器加工

sentences.en: The edge must be machined down to 0.02 millimetres.
sentences.cn: 这边缘必须切割到0.02毫米的精确度。

jushi.english: The new sewing machine didn't go down very well even after a month's use.
jushi.chinese: 这台新缝纫机用了一个月但还是不怎么顺手。

jushi.english: How are the two halves of the machine joined together?
jushi.chinese: 这台机器的两部分是如何连在一起的?

jushi.english: The factory has decided to farm out production of some of the machine parts to other plants.
jushi.chinese: 这家工厂决定把一些机器零件包给其他工厂去生产。
